name: DEADLY RECTANGLE
description:
DEADLY RECTANGLE

Is a little Indie Game I made,

it has 15 Levels and 2 final bosses that are absolutely insane!

Its a very simple game but still very fun and challenging! The game is approximately 2 - 3,5 Hours long and what could be the last screenshot? Hmm... More Content is going to come in a few weeks. It is going to be a payed version, but don't worry! It's worth it, just wait for it!
